result.markdown:
---
title: "Hyperband Series - Benchmarking"
description: |
  Benchmark Random Search and Hyperband on XGBoost.
categories:
  - tuning
  - classification
author:
  - name: Marc Becker
    url: https://github.com/be-marc
date: 2022-12-02
knitr:
  opts_chunk:
    R.options:
      datatable.print.nrows: 6
---



::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(data.table)

instance = readRDS("instance.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
data = as.data.table(instance$archive)

data[, runtime := as.numeric(difftime(timestamp, data$timestamp[1]))/60]
data_100 = data[subsample.frac == 1]
data_100[, best_bacc := cummax(classif.bacc)]
```
:::

::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data_100, aes(x = runtime, y = best_bacc)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){fig-align='center' width=672}
:::
:::
